description.description: Human readable description of the integration

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the integration applies

block.description: Manages integration resources, for example Slack or OpsGenie.

disk_size.description: Size of the data disks, in gigabytes

disk_type.description: Storage class of the data disks (find the list of valid values below)

instance_type.description: Instance type of the managed cluster (find the list of valid values below)

network_id.description: ID of the network in which the managed cluster exists

project_id.description: ID of the project in which the managed cluster exists

projection_level.description: Determines whether to run no projections, system projections only, or system and user projections (find the list of valid values below) Defaults to `off`.

region.description: Region in which the cluster was created. Determined by the region of the Network

resource_provider.description: Provider in which the cluster was created. Determined by the provider of the Network.

server_version.description: Server version to provision (find the list of valid values below)

topology.description: Topology of the managed cluster (`single-node` or `three-node-multi-zone`)

block.description: Manages EventStoreDB instances and clusters in Event Store Cloud

cidr_block.description: Address space of the network in CIDR block notation

region.description: Provider region in which to provision the network

resource_provider.description: Cloud Provider in which to provision the network.

block.description: Manages VPC (network) resources in Event Store Cloud

peer_account_id.description: Account identifier in which to the peer network exists

peer_network_id.description: Network identifier of the peer network exists

peer_network_region.description: Provider region in which to the peer network exists

peer_resource_provider.description: Cloud Provider in which the target network exists

provider_metadata.description: Metadata about the remote end of the peering connection

routes.description: Routes to create from the Event Store network to the peer network

block.description: Manages peering connections between Event Store Cloud VPCs and customer own VPCs
Manages projects within an organization in Event Store Cloud

description.description: Human readable description of the job

max_backup_count.description: The maximum number of backups to keep for this job

project_id.description: ID of the project in which the backup exists

schedule.description: Schedule for the backup, defined using restricted subset of cron

source_cluster_id.description: the ID of the cluster to back up

cidr_block.description: Address space of the network in CIDR block notation

region.description: Provider region in which to provision the network

resource_provider.description: Cloud Provider in which to provision the network.

block.description: Retrieves data for an existing `Network` resource
Retrieves data for an existing `Project` resource
